item.title: Israel Says It Will Keep Troops ‘Temporarily’ in 5 Points in Lebanon
item.description: The announcement raised the specter of renewed fighting in southern Lebanon between Israel and Hezbollah, the Lebanese militia.

item.title: Pope Francis Will Remain in Hospital for ‘Complex’ Clinical Issue

item.title: South Korean Actress Kim Sae-ron Is Found Dead

item.title: Zakia Jafri, Who Sought Justice for Victims of Indian Riots, Dies at 86
item.description: For two decades, she waged a legal battle against government officials in India after her husband was brutally killed in Gujarati in 2002.
